channel.title: The Lord of the Rings Audiobook - Unabridged By Phil Dragash
channel.description: The Lord of the Rings - Unabridged By Phil Dragash Including: The Fellowship of the RIng The Two Towers The Return of the King
channel.itunes:summary: The Lord of the Rings - Unabridged By Phil Dragash Including: The Fellowship of the RIng The Two Towers The Return of the King

item.title: Appendix - A (III) - Durins Folk
item.description:
Appendix - A (III) - Durins Folk by J.R.R Tolkien.

AudioBook read, produced and edited by Phil Dragash.

Music and sound effects taken from "The Lord of the Rings" Motion pictures.

Uploaded by Eddie Rourke
item.content:encoded:
Appendix - A (III) - Durins Folk by J.R.R Tolkien.

AudioBook read, produced and edited by Phil Dragash.

Music and sound effects taken from "The Lord of the Rings" Motion pictures.

Uploaded by Eddie Rourke
